definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: In Taipei's movie district, the action flicks are always the biggest draws.
sentences.chinese: 臺北西門町的電影街中，動作片的觀衆總是最多。

sentences.english: I like to pretend that life is an action movie.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡把生活想象成動作片。

sentences.english: My movies have never been frenetically cut, the way a lot of action is done today.
sentences.chinese: 我的電影從來不曾像今天很多動作片那樣亂剪一通。

sentences.english: I love romantic movies, but John loves action movies.
sentences.chinese: 我愛看浪漫電影，但約翰喜歡看動作片。

sentences.english: This is an action movie. It was all about fighting and killing.
sentences.chinese: 這是一部動作片，是關於打打殺殺的。

sentences.english: Listen to Jason and Marni discuss this long-awaited action movie combination.
sentences.chinese: 請聽詹森和瑪尼如何討論這部期待已久的動作片。

sentences.english: All our period films seem to be mixed with martial arts and action.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎所有的古裝片都包含了中國武術和動作片的元素。

sentences.english: I like films with plenty of action.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡情節曲折離奇的動作片。

sentences.english: June really likes action movies, and she often goes to see Chinese action movies.
sentences.chinese: 瓊的確喜歡動作片，並且她常去看中國功夫片。

sentences.english: I like to see detective and action movies .
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡看偵探片和動作片。

sentences.english: Well, I like them both, but if I have to pick one, it would be action movies.
sentences.chinese: 我兩種都喜歡，如果要我選我會選動作片。

sentences.english: After the movie, he changed the road march to the action movies.
sentences.chinese: 之後他轉變戲路，向動作片進軍。

sentences.english: My favorite movie are action movie and thrillers .
sentences.chinese: 我最愛的電影是動作片和驚竦片。

sentences.english: There was an old action movie next.
sentences.chinese: 接下來演的是一部老動作片。

sentences.english: On television, I usually prefer watching an action movie than a program about art.
sentences.chinese: 看電視時，相比文藝節目，我一般更喜歡看動作片。
我個人比較喜歡動作片。

definition: golden branch, jade leaves (idiom); fig. blue-blooded nobility, esp. imperial kinsmen or peerless beauty
third category movie (containing sexual or violent content)
(of a movie, show etc) to attract large audiences
amusing speech or act/jokes/antics/funny/amusing/Taiwan pr. [xue1 tou2]
